sql.value: select id, menu_name, permission_code, router_path, parent_id, menu_type, is_menu, menu_status, component_path, is_external_link, icon_path, sort, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, revision from sys_menu where is_deleted = 0 #[and is_menu = :isMenu] #[and permission_code = :permissionCode] #[and menu_name like :menuName] #[and menu_status = :menuStatus] #[and menu_id in (:menuIds)] #[and parent_id = :parentId] order by sort desc, id desc
